nobodyWon: Oh no! Looks like nobody was won this match! Remember, if you are playing in singleplayer, you need to win at least the half of the specified rounds!
roundEnded: All rounds are over! Thanks for playing!
roundWinner: Congratulations {{user}}! You found the correct answer in {{time}}!

errors.noVoiceChannel: You need to be on a voice channel so I can get in and start the match!
errors.onlyHostCanFinish: Only the match host can finish the game!
errors.noUsersInTheVoiceChannel: It seems that the host is no longer on the voice channel, please restart the match.
errors.unableToLoadStream: For some extremely evil reason, I was unable to load the current stream of the theme and so I was unable to continue! Restart the game and try again.

roundStarted.title: The {{currentRound}} round has started!
roundStarted.description: What is the anime for this {{themeType}}? You have {{time}} to guess!

preparingMatch.title: Preparing the match...
preparingMatch.description: I'm collecting all the necessary data to start the match, it may take some time!

fields.roundsDuration: Each round will have a duration of **{{time}}**
fields.matchMode: I detected that you are playing on **{{mode}}**

startingNextRound.title: Starting the next round...
startingNextRound.description: I'm collecting all the necessary data to start the round, it may take some time!

hint.title: {{emoji}} Give me a hint!
hint.noSufficientCakes: You don't have enough cakes! A hint costs {{price}} cake, go vote for me on top.gg to get more cakes!

matchEndedLeaderboard.title: {{emoji}} Match Leaderboard
matchEndedLeaderboard.matchWinnerUser: The winner of this match is...{{user}}! Congratlutations! You won **{{xp}}** XP.
